pairing_complete_import.description:
Dyn VIZIO SmartCast-apparaat is no ferbûn mei Home Assistant. 

De tagongstoken is '** {access_token} **'.

user.description: In tagongstoke is allinnich nedich foar TV's. Ast in TV konfigurearrest en noch gjin tagongstoke hast, lit dat dan leech en trochrin it keppelingsproses.

data.apps_to_include_or_exclude: Apps om op te nimmen of út te sluten
